meanings.sent1: She is a working woman who helps people in need.
meanings.sent2: The working team completed the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The working bee diligently collected nectar from flowers.
meanings.sent4: His working mind never stops coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The working ants tirelessly built their intricate tunnels.

meanings.sent1: The working machine efficiently produced goods.
meanings.sent2: The working computer processed the data quickly.
meanings.sent3: The working clock ticked steadily on the wall.
meanings.sent4: His working heart pumped blood throughout his body.
meanings.sent5: The working engine hummed softly in the background.

meanings.sent1: The working elevator took us to the top floor.
meanings.sent2: The working phone connected us to our friends.
meanings.sent3: The working faucet provided clean water for drinking.
meanings.sent4: His working car never let him down on long journeys.
meanings.sent5: The working light illuminated the dark room.
